describe: Armenia is a landlocked country located in the South Caucasus region of Eurasia. Known for its rich cultural heritage, ancient history, and stunning landscapes, Armenia is home to the majestic Mount Ararat and numerous historical sites, including ancient monasteries and churches.

cities.name: 🏙 Yerevan
cities.geographical_location: Located in the western part of Armenia, Yerevan is the capital and largest city of the country.
cities.climate: Yerevan experiences a continental climate with hot summers and cold winters.
popular_attractions: Matenadaran (Mesrop Mashtots Institute of Ancient Manuscripts)

cities.name: 🏙 Gyumri
cities.geographical_location: Situated in the northwestern part of Armenia, Gyumri is the second-largest city in the country.
cities.climate: Gyumri has a humid continental climate with cold winters and mild summers.
cities.famous_cuisine: Gyumri Khash, Ttu Lavash (sour lavash), and Gata.

cities.name: 🌳 Dilijan
cities.geographical_location: Located in the northeastern part of Armenia, Dilijan is known for its lush forests and natural beauty.
cities.climate: Dilijan has a humid continental climate with cool summers and cold winters.
cities.famous_cuisine: Ishkhan (trout) dishes, Spas (yogurt soup), and Baklava.
